thread.title: Billings man denies kicking girlfriend so hard her hip broke
thread.title_full: Billings man denies kicking girlfriend so hard her hip broke

title: Billings man denies kicking girlfriend so hard her hip broke
text:
Published By: Billings Gazette - Today 
A Billings man accused of kicking his girlfriend so hard he broke her hip denied felony assault charges on Friday in District Court....
